channel.title: Master on Milad Shafiee
channel.description: Recent content in Master on Milad Shafiee

item.title: MAster Thesis
item.description: Push recovery of a humanoid robot under severe external disturbance 2013 â€“ 2015 I passed my master thesis under the supervision of Prof. Aghil Yousefi-Koma and my goal was to employ whole capability of a biped robot for balance recovery. In this regard my work can be devided into two parts. + I developed a human-inspired feedback controller for push recovery of Mini-SURENA humanoid robot + We deploy model predictive control and concept of Divergent Component of motion to developing a Push recovery Controller.
